#labels Tools,Guide
= Recommended Tools to Work on S/C=
This is a short guide that describes how to get the tools that we recommend for working with Scala, Maven and SVN within the Eclipse IDE

==Eclipse==
Install the Eclipse IDE for Java Developers 3.6.2 (_Helios_) from http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
 * Within Eclipse go to _Help_, _Check for updates..._, update to newest Helios release

==Scala==
Install the Scala plugin for Eclipse:
  * Within Eclipse go to _Help_, _Install New Software..._
  * Add as a new location: http://download.scala-ide.org/releases/2.0.0-beta
  * Install all the available items from that source.

==Maven==
Install the Maven plugin for Eclipse and the Maven-Scala integration plugin:
  * Within Eclipse go to _Help_, _Install New Software..._
  * Add as a new location: "http://alchim31.free.fr/m2e-scala/update-site".
  * Install both "m2e - Maven Integration for Eclipse" and "Maven Integration for Scala IDE".

==SVN==
Install _Subclipse_ from the _Eclipse Marketplace_: You can find it in the Eclipse _Help_ menu, it's the last entry. On OS X we recommend using the SVNKit client, which you can install in the "Install New Software ..." menu and activate in _Eclipse_, _Preferences..._, _Team_, _SVN_, _Client_
